long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Forkity Extension is a useful tool to save and organize all your recipes directly to your Forkity profile.

Forkity simplifies all your recipes in an easy to read format all stored in a single place never to be lost again. No more searching multiple apps or websites for where you saved that recipe again.
